scripts.generateParser: cd src/parser; rm -rf ./generated/*; java -Xmx500M -cp "../../antlr-4.7.1-complete.jar:$CLASSPATH" org.antlr.v4.Tool -o generated -Dlanguage=JavaScript FHIRPath.g4
scripts.build:browser: cp LICENSE.md browser-build && cd browser-build && webpack && rm -f fhirpath.zip && zip fhirpath.zip LICENSE.md fhirpath.min.js && rm LICENSE.md
scripts.test:demo: npm run build && cd demo && npm run build && grunt test:e2e
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test:unit && npm run test:demo && npm run test:browser-build
